feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.132.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: acme and external CA for PKI by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3583
  • Feat/redis sentinel support by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3640
  • feat: added region flag by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3659
  • Allow machine identity to read billing by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3665
  • Fix: Update aws secret manager sync to handle constrained iam policies by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3664
  • feat: add token period support for ua by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3666
  • feat(secret-sharing): Require Login for Secrets Shared to Specific Emails by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3670
  • Improved Key Schema docs + tooltip by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3672
  • fix: allow https on gateway k8s hosts by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3678
  • feat: add kubernetes dynamic secret by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3668
  • feat(access-request): fix deleted policy interfering with the newest and valid policy and fix for default values on the creation form by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3681
  • add manage billing permission for billing by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3682
  • Add support for offline lottie by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3683
  • feat(policies): Bypass Approval Rework by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3662
  • Feat: Allow cert issue against template by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3686
  • feat(access-request): fix issue for deleted custom privileges reopening old closed access requests by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3691

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.131.0-postgres...infisical/v0.132.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.41.5
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 4061feba2 Update login.go
  • 0d0fddb53 feat(cli): automatically open browser on login

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.132.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(secret-sync): RE2 for regex + input limits by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3692
  • feat(secret-rotation): MySQL Secret Rotation v2 by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3657
  • Feat/dynamic secret username template by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3667
  • Fix(org-admin-project-access): Check for recipients prior to sending project access email by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3673
  • feat: resolved gateway verify issue and validation check by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3700
  • revamp UI for access requests by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3697
  • feat(instance-management): organizations overview and control by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3688

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.132.0-postgres...infisical/v0.132.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.41.6
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 5878904f7 Merge pull request #3704 from Infisical/feat/add-auto-login-for-bad-sessions-1
  • 6e3fe0fe2 misc: addressed comments
  • 9d11babc4 misc: add error message
  • ce97179b4 feat: spawn new session for login
  • f9ebb919e feat: add auto login for bad user sessions

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.41.7
entry.content:
Changelog

  • d23beaedf Merge pull request #3707 from Infisical/misc/workspace-file-now-only-needed-when-project-id-omitted
  • 893a042c2 Merge pull request #3698 from Infisical/daniel/cli-api-errors
  • f3fb65fcc misc: update error message being displayed
  • c0add863b misc: workspace file now only needed when project id is omitted (CLI)
  • 22f32e060 filter out random request ID value
  • b4f26aac2 fix: tests failing
  • b634a6c37 requested changes
  • 080ae5ce6 fix(cli): improve error handling
